questions.title: Do whales hunt other whales?
questions.author: JaSON Params
questions.content: I know some whales eat fish, but do any actively hunt other whales or dolphins?

questions.title: What is the loudest animal on the planet?
questions.author: Beth
questions.content: I know that there are a lot of loud things on land (like my family), but are there louder things in the ocean?
